reviews.text: Having a great company event here. Nice foods, dessert, wine, etc. Walking distance from many famous hotels. Shopping mall around.
A fantastic place with a wonderful and awesome host Junie. Nice atmosphere and fantastic drinks and food options.. staff are very friendly. Keep up the good work

Mooloolabar is a laid-back gem near Joo Chiat Road with a relaxed, casual vibe that’s perfect for winding down. The ambience is cozy and unpretentious — great for a chill evening out. It’s especially ideal for happy hour, with a solid range of affordable drink options that won’t break the bank.

After drinks, you can simply cross the street for a casual dinner, making it a convenient spot to kick off your night. If you’re in the area and looking for a no-fuss place with good vibes and great value, Mooloolabar is worth a stop.

Good to chill house wine is very good. Sitting outdoors on windy day. Seeing the passerby with all sorts. N near music. Service is very good. Cute young waiter can spare me a Marlboro mint flare for a puff. Free. Quite a sweetheart. If you are sitting in. Beware they may play sports show. So music is sayonara.

White sauvignon. Blanc is very good $10 I am trying the red. Is dry and also good. But nothing beats my dad home made wine. Of course. But a very good deal here with very good service n pretty n cute waiters n bar tendeder girl.  Food is cheaper here according to exhorbant Dr evil prices along east coast road.

Great place to drink beer with you loved ones!
Must have otak dumpling and chicken stay!
